s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RADIATOR GRILLE SIDE MOULDING LH (w/ Plated Moulding)

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw to install the radiator grille side moulding.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RADIATOR GRILLE SIDE MOULDING RH (w/ Plated Moulding)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER RADIATOR GRILLE MOULDING (w/ Plated Moulding)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to install the lower radiator grille moulding.
Attach the 2 guides and 2 claws to install the radiator grille emblem base.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RADIATOR GRILLE (OR FRONT PANEL) EMBLEM

s2.ptxt: Attach the guide and 2 claws to install the radiator grille (or front panel) emblem.
